item.title: Litter Bin Full, 31st July

item.title: Building materials on pavement, 31st July
item.description:
Materials take up half the pavement and together with unrelated 'Diversion' sign cause a significant obstruction. There is no room for a mobility scooter or push-chair to pass.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woolwich Road, West Heath, London

item.title: Turney Road SE21 a few yards west of house number 82, 31st July
item.description:
Turney Road SE21 a few yards west of house number 82 ie going towards railway bridge is a Keep Right footpath build out board – said board tagged – check back. Google Streetview show this: https://www.google.com/maps/place/82+Turney+Rd,+London+SE21+7JH/@51.4469103,-0.0950622,3a,75y,199.75h,88.32t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1ss7U8uSm5U5qByCoW_kvuVQ!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D1.6760117927064044%26panoid%3Ds7U8uSm5U5qByCoW_kvuVQ%26yaw%3D199.7502625843107!7i16384!8i8192!4m6!3m5!1s0x4876040a1e723d87:0x1938510a42874511!8m2!3d51.4467772!4d-0.0948397!16s%2Fg%2F11c2f8545n?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI1MDcyOS4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 82, Turney Road, Dulwich Village, London

item.title: Baby in a basket (doll), 31st July
item.description:
Flytipling on daily basis now. Just keep picking up after them. No fines. Why does anyone bother paying for waste collection when flytipping is this easy.
